content.html: Police see a Black person with a firearm & first thought is, gun must be illegal, they are a danger Police see a white person with a firearm & first thought is, gun is legally owned, they must be in danger
content.value:
Police see a Black person with a firearm & first thought is, gun must be illegal, they are a danger 

Police see a white person with a firearm & first thought is, gun is legally owned, they must be in danger
